items.name: Shaper's Touch
explicitMods: 2% increased Melee Physical Damage per 10 Dexterity
flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants cold resistance to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 42% additional Cold Resistance
You and nearby allies gain 4% additional maximum Cold Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2153 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 50% more Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Enchants your shield with the power of storms, which lashes out to deal arcing lightning damage to attackers when you block them.
explicitMods: Buff grants +27% Chance to Block Spell Damage while holding a Shield
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Kalandra's Touch
flavourText: On one hand, you have a choice.
On the other, you have its twin.

101% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Aegis Aurora
implicitMods: 7% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Chaos Damage
explicitMods: Recover Energy Shield equal to 2% of Armour when you Block
18% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
flavourText: Born from the marriage of ice and sky,
the aurora evokes both awe and power.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: 20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
explicitMods: This Gem can only Support Skill Gems requiring Level 42 or lower
You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly
Trigger Supported Spells when you take 661 total Damage from Hits
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Vaal, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 15% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 3000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Modifiers to Skill Effect Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention

39% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 20% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 10000

Reflects 9000% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage each second,
or when Buff expires or is depleted
hybrid.secDescrText: Applies a buff that raises your armour, and takes some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. Each second, the skill deals reflected damage to surrounding enemies based on the damage taken by the buff in that second. When the buff is removed, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken by the buff. You cannot have the buff at the same time as any other Guard skill.

items.name: Mageblood
explicitMods: Magic Utility Flasks cannot be Used
Leftmost 4 Magic Utility Flasks constantly apply their Flask Effects to you
Magic Utility Flask Effects cannot be removed
flavourText: Rivers of power course through your veins.

items.name: Hand of Wisdom and Action
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
Grants 1% increased Elemental Damage per 2% Quality
explicitMods: 1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Adds 1 to 10 Lightning Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 10 Intelligence
flavourText: Fragments of the whole that washes clean the skies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, giving a chance to double the duration of stuns on them. Attacking the cursed enemy will leech life and mana, stunning them will grant rage, and killing it will grant an endurance charge. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies grant 2.95% Life Leech when Hit by Attacks
Cursed enemies grant 2.95% Mana Leech when Hit by Attacks
Cursed enemies have a 100% chance to grant an Endurance Charge when slain
Hits against Cursed Enemies have 59% chance to double Stun Duration
Cursed Enemies grant 20 Rage Regenerated over 1 second when Stunned
